scenario_text.value: *huff* *huff* *puff*
Agumon! You got more in you?
...You bet I do, Takuma!

And thanks. I’m glad you don’t try and tell
me to stop anymore.
It means you trust me!
Agumon...

I won’t lose! Not with your heart driving me
forward. Not when you never give up!

And that goes for everyone else too! Look
around, Takuma! Look at all our friends!

They’re fighting like true partners, trusting
each other as if their hearts were one!
Nobody is about to give up now!

Agumon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be here
without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Greymon! You got more in you?
...You bet I do! And one more thing.
Thanks, Takuma. Thanks for believing in me.

That alone makes me feel a hundred times
stronger!
Greymon...

As long as you refuse to give up, I will keep
fighting, keep looking for a way to win!

Seems the others all feel that way too. Look
around, Takuma! Take a look at our friends!

They fight with their partners as one! They
all believe in each other!

It’s not just us. Nobody is thinking of
dropping out of this fight.

Greymon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be here
without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Tyrannomon! You got more in you?
I...I’m fine! I could keep this up all day!

Listen, I’m not the smartest, so I don’t know
how to put this...
But I’m real glad you believe in me!
Tyrannomon...

I will keep picking myself up and getting
back in the fight for as long as you want!

And it’s not just me. Look! I want you to see
how our friends are doing.

They all trust their partners. So no matter
how much it hurts, or how hard it gets...

We’ll keep fighting to the end! We’ll do it
for our partners!

Tyrannomon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
Let’s do this, Tyrannomon!!!
You got it!!!
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Tuskmon! You got more in you?

...’Course I do! Why would you even ask?
I’ll tell you one thing, though...
I appreciate your not givin’ up on me.

Thanks to you, I can hang in there as long as
it takes. I’m ready for this!
Tuskmon...

This is the big one, and you’re leaving him
to me! I’d spit blood before I let you down!

That goes for the others, too! Look around,
Takuma! Look at all our friends!

The reason they fight on despite their wounds
is because their partners believe in them.

Nobody’s thinkin’ of dropping out of this
fight!

Tuskmon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be here
without the others to begin with.
Grrrrrrr...
SkullGreymon! You got more in you?
...Grr... Graaah! Grrr...
Oooh... Aaah... Thaaannnkkksss...
Grrrrrrr...
SkullGreymon...
I’ll...win...for...you...
We...all...feel...same...
Believe...Takuma...
We...all...fight...

SkullGreymon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
MetalGreymon! You got more in you?
You bet!

...And I’m sure you’re going to get worried,
but I want you to do something for me.
Believe in me, no matter what!
MetalGreymon...

I’ve decided to fight for you till the end.
I’ll keep going as long as you don’t give up.

The others all feel the same way, I can tell.
You can see the determination in their eyes.

That’s proof of how much they trust their
partners! They fully believe in each other!
And we can’t afford to lose either, can we?

MetalGreymon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Triceramon! You got more in you?
...I could keep this up all day.

No, I shouldn’t mislead you. In truth, I’m
near my limit, but I will fight to the end.
As long as you keep believing in me.
Triceramon...

Don’t sound so sad, Takuma. Right now, I just
want you to believe I can do this.

It’s not just me. Everyone else feels the
same way too.

As long as our partners believe in us,
there’s nothing we can’t do!!!

I cannot afford to back down now. Not when
the others are counting on me!

Triceramon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Megadramon! You got more in you?
...What? I’m just getting warmed up.
You’re not actually worried, are you, Takuma?

As long as you yearn for my victory, I can
keep going, keep fighting forever!
Megadramon...

So what if my flesh is rent or my claws
break? I’ll fight as long as you wish to win!

The others seem to feel the same way. Look,
they all fight with their humans as one.
We feel fear and pain just as humans do.

But you don’t see any of us asking to stop
the fight, do you?

Megadramon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
WarGreymon! You got more in you?
Yeah! No problem!

And I don’t want you taking your eyes off me
during this fight, Takuma.
Especially if you believe I can win it.
WarGreymon...

I never look back. I simply trust that you
will be there behind me.

The others all seem to feel the same way too.
Look around.

It’s because they trust in their partners
that they can fight on without flinching.

It’s not just me, and it’s not just you. We
are all fighting this together.

WarGreymon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Dinorexmon! You got more in you?
Yes, I am quite well.

...Thank you, Takuma. I appreciate that you
respect my show of strength.
Thank you for refusing to doubt my victory.
Dinorexmon...

Fear not. I will not lose. So long as you
stand firm, I too shall not falter.

The others all strive to respond to their
partners’ wishes as well.
Doubtless they too will not fall.

Now, Takuma, let me continue on with the
others! Let us all win this together!

Dinorexmon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Machinedramon! You got more in you?

Indubitably! My combat abilities are far from
exhausted.
...You need only believe, Takuma.

Believe that your choosing me was not a
mistake.
Machinedramon...
I trust that you believe in me.
Look, it’s the same for the others.

I fight on not so we can save the world, but
because I have a partner who believes in me.

Yes, I fight because of what we went through
together, because I believe in my friends!

Machinedramon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Fanglongmon! You got more in you?

So long as my bond with you remains unbroken,
I will never be defeated!

And allow me to express my gratitude to you.
My ties with that creature are strong.

Even so, you elected to have me fight here.
That shows how much faith you have in me.
Fanglongmon...

As long as you do not give in, I will fight
with all I have.

And it is not only you and I. Our colleagues
also fight for those who believe in them.

Behold the valiant figures of our companions,
fighting with their partners as one!

Now, let me go on, Takuma! I must keep them
safe!

Fanglongmon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be
here without the others to begin with.
*huff* *huff* *puff*
Omegamon! You got more in you?
Yes, don’t worry about me!

...And thank you, Takuma. I can feel what is
in your heart as you stand behind me.
Please, keep believing in me!
Omegamon...

Though my raw strength may have faded, as
long as you believe in me, I will fight on!

Heh... Seems the others would agree. Look
around, Takuma! Look at all our friends!

They all have faith in their partners! They
believe in one another!
Which of course goes for me as well, Takuma.

Omegamon... You’re right. We wouldn’t be here
without the others to begin with.

Each of us helps the others keep going! So
I’ll keep going too! No looking back!
Let’s go, Agumon!
I’m on it!
Let’s go, Greymon!
You got it!
Let’s do this, Tyrannomon!!!
I’m gonna do this!
Let’s go, Tuskmon!
All right!
Let’s go, SkullGreymon!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWR!!!
Let’s go, MetalGreymon!
Leave it to me!
Let’s go, Triceramon!
Yeah!
Let’s go, Megadramon!
You bet!
Let’s go, WarGreymon!
You got it!
Let’s go, Dinorexmon!
Absolutely!
Let’s go, Machinedramon!
I’m on it!
Let’s go, Fanglongmon!
Indeed!
Let’s go, Omegamon!
Leave it to me!
